DOC.brief_summary: Healthy subjects take single dose of 80mg atorvastatin, then measured their circulating endothelial microparticles and flow-mediated vasodilation in the brachial artery by ultrasound at different time points.
DOC.brief_title: Single Dose of Atorvastatin and Circulating Endothelial Microparticles
DOC.criteria: healthy youth acute pathologies familial history of cardiovascular disease smoking or drinking alcohol
